name: Amazon WoW (Women of the World)
who: women engineering and tech students in India
summary: Amazon WoW is a program for women engineering students, offering sessions, networking, and guidance for tech careers and internships.
focus: Women students interested in software development and tech roles.
activities: Tech sessions, mentorship, interview preparation, interaction with Amazonians.
good_for: B.Tech/B.E., MCA, and related degree students who want to enter software roles.

name: Flipkart Runway
summary: Flipkart Runway is a women-only engineering internship and hiring program, aimed at providing exposure and opportunities in product and tech roles.
activities: Internships, projects, mentorship, pre-placement offers for strong performers.
good_for: Final-year or pre-final-year engineering students and early-career women engineers.

name: HSBC Power2Her / Women Returnship Programs
summary: Women-focused returnship programs like HSBC Power2Her help women professionals restart their careers after a break.
focus: Women who took a career break and want to re-enter the workforce in corporate roles like finance, tech, and operations.
activities: Training, mentoring, and project-based roles that may lead to full-time opportunities.
good_for: Women with prior work experience in finance, tech, operations, or related fields.

name: Women Tech Mentoring & Communities
who: girls and women in tech at all stages
summary: Various women-in-tech communities offer free mentorship, talks, and networking, helping women stay in tech.
focus: Women and girls in tech at all stages.
good_for: Any girl or woman who wants peers and mentors in tech.

name: Scholarships for Girls on National Scholarship Portal (NSP)
who: school and college girls across India
summary: The National Scholarship Portal lists many central and state government scholarships for Indian girls and women to continue their education.
focus: Government scholarships and financial aid for girls at school, college, and higher education level.
activities: Tuition fee support, maintenance allowance, incentives for girls in different categories.
good_for: Girls from classes 1–12, undergraduate, and postgraduate levels who need financial support.

name: AICTE Pragati Scholarship for Girl Students
who: girl students pursuing technical diploma or degree
summary: Pragati is an AICTE scheme that provides scholarships to girl students pursuing technical education to encourage them into engineering and diploma programs.
focus: Girls admitted to AICTE-approved technical institutes in diploma or degree programs.
activities: Annual scholarship amount for tuition fees and other expenses.
good_for: Girls in diploma/degree engineering and technical courses from families with limited income.

name: Post-Graduate Indira Gandhi Scholarship for Single Girl Child
who: single girl child pursuing post‑graduate programs
summary: UGC’s Indira Gandhi Scholarship supports single girl children who are pursuing full‑time regular PG courses in recognized universities/colleges.
focus: Single girl child in a family pursuing postgraduate education.
activities: Monthly financial assistance during the PG course.
good_for: Girls who are the only daughter in their family and are enrolled in regular PG programs.

name: Government Scholarships for Women in Arts & Humanities
who: women in arts, design, and humanities
summary: Many scholarships and fellowships support women in arts, design, and humanities, including central and state schemes.
focus: Women in arts, design, social sciences, and humanities.
good_for: Women who want to study or build careers in arts, design, social sciences, and humanities.

name: Government Women Schemes – Education & Career (Central & State)
who: girls and women seeking education, training, or employment support
summary: Central and state governments run multiple schemes for women, including scholarships, skill development, overseas study support, and youth empowerment programs.
focus: Education, skills, and entrepreneurship support for women and girls.
activities: Scholarships, fee waivers, coaching support, skill training, and financial assistance.
good_for: Girls and young women who want to continue studies, upskill, or prepare for jobs and exams.

name: Women Entrepreneurship & Business Support Schemes
who: women who want to start or grow a business
summary: Several schemes support women entrepreneurs in India with easier loans, subsidies, and training, helping them start or expand small businesses.
focus: Women-led micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) and startups.
activities: Credit-linked subsidies, training, incubation, and mentorship.
good_for: Women planning to start a small business, shop, online venture, or startup.
